channel.title: Authors on 行走云端
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on 行走云端

item.description: 18年的工作经验，熟悉企业内多个领域的运作，能提供富有价值的观点和见解 擅长领域：战略规划落地、企业创新经营、人力资源整合、投资风控管理，平台搭建专家 专业优势：外贸自建站平台搭建（e-Commerce/ Magento, Prestashop, Wordpress, CMF/ Joomla, Drupal） 职业技能：跨境电商运营(亚马逊)、新媒体运营 | 产品运营、SEO分析处理 | 企业建站、淘宝美工、网络运维、IT管理 I am a professional amazon global seller and web developer. 18 years of job experience in different positions have offered me opportunities to understand different job aspects. Obtain a responsible and challenging position that will allow me to learn new technologies and skills while utilizing my previous.
